title: Game Footsteps
description: Game Footsteps is a professional foley studio recorded sound library featuring 1655 footstep sound effects across 20+ surface types and shoe aesthetics.
longDescription:
Audio Demo


With a focus on recording with boots and sneaker shoe styles, you’ll hear just about every surface you’d hear in games and film. Find hard surfaces like cobblestone, brick, concrete to softer surfaces like sand, wood, snow gravel & more. Most footsteps include different pacing patterns such as: walking, walking slowly, running and jumping. Any movement pace is covered.


  •  1,656 footstep sound effects
  •  22 surface types and shoe aesthetics
  •  399.9MB of sounds
  • All in 44k 16bit .wav

You may also like:


Game Weapons

MMO Game Magic Sounds

Game Character Female Elf

Isolated Ambient Loops


Game Footsteps sound effects library provides you with the perfect footstep sfx you will need to complete almost any of your projects. You can hear the boots stomping through the gravel and sneakers whispering through the snow, you will not be left wanting when you get a hold of these perfect footstep sounds. Game Footsteps is an excellent library to bolster your existing sound banks or starter pack for those who need to have a solid foundation of footsteps on surfaces, grounds, floor and more.  


UCS Compliant & Soundminer Metadata 


All sound effects labeling is UCS compliant & is organized into categories to make it easier to navigate with understandable folder structures: Astro Turf, Brick, Cobblestone, Concrete, Dirt, Gravel, Metal, Metal Thin, Sand, Snow, Wood, Wood Resonate, Wood Loose, Wood Tight, Hardwood, With Boots, With Sneakers and more. On top of UCS, Game Footsteps features extensive metadata embedded in the files using soundminer metadata to help you find the right sound at the right time as well.


All of the 1,655 sound files are designed to make your life easier, production workflow faster and delivered in 96kHz/24bit .WAV file format to maintain top-notch audio fidelity. 


Product Details:

  • 1656 footstep sound effects files
  • 22 surface types & shoe styles
  • All in 44k 16bit .wav
  • 399.9MB of samples
  • Includes embedded Soundminer metadata
  • UCS Compliant
  • 38 minutes of audio

  • 47 Brick

  • 93 Dirt - Sneakers 
  • 97 Gravel - Boots
  • 95 Gravel - Sneakers
  • 95 Metal - Boots
  • 104 Metal - Sneakers
  • 17 Metal - Thin
  • 94 Sand - Boots
  • 91 Sand - Sneakers
  • 40 Snow - Sneakers
  • 94 Wood - Boots

  • 58 Wood - Pallet Loose
  • 39 Wood - Pallet Tight
  • 56 Wood - Resonate
  • 96 Wood - Sneakers
  • All sound effects are youtube friendly & royalty free
  • RTU-OTB (Ready to be used out of the box)
